prodNameC: 諾法鐵人類抗弓漿蟲免疫球蛋白G酵素免疫分析套組
ingredientsDesc:
Toxoplasma gondii Coated Wells (IgG):12 breakapart 8-well snap-off strips coated with Toxoplasma gondii antigen; vacuum sealed, in resealable aluminium foil.
IgG Sample Diluent***:1 bottle containing 100 ml of buffer for sample dilution; pH 7.2±0.2, coloured yellow; ready to use; white cpa.
Stop Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml sulphuric acid, 0.2 mol/l; ready to use; red cap.
Washing Solution (20x conc.)*:1bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer for washing the wells; pH 7.2±0.2; white cap.
TMB Substrate: 1bottle containing 15 ml 3,3’,5,5’-tetramethylbenzidine (TMB); ready to use; yellow cap.
Toxoplasma gondii anti-IgG conjugate**: 1bottle containing 20 ml of peroxidase labelled antibodies to human IgG; coloured red; ready to use; black cap.
Toxoplasma gondii IgG Standards***: 4 vials, each containing 2ml; coloured yellow; ready to use:
Standard A: 0 IU/ml; blue cap
Standard B: 50 IU/ml; green cap
Standard C: 100 IU/ml; yellow cap
Standard D: 200 IU/ml; red cap
* contains 0.01%
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 諾法鐵抗弓漿蟲免疫球蛋白G酵素免疫分析套組是用來做為人類血清或血漿中抗弓漿蟲人類免疫球蛋白G分型抗體之定性及定量偵測。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3780 嚙齒動物弓漿蟲血清試劑
